vote.title: Authorize (1) reprogramming of funds in an amount not to exceed $33,782.60 from 2017 General Obligation Bond Funds originally allocated as Council District 8 Discretionary Funds for the Singing Hills Recreation Center Replacement to playground replacements at Danieldale Park in the amount of $5,000.00 and Willoughby Park in the amount of $28,782.60; and (2) a construction contract for the construction of playground replacements at Danieldale Park located at 300 West Wheatland Road, in the amount of $200,100.00 and Willoughby Park located at 9000 Willoughby Boulevard, in the amount of $179,600.00 - Henneberger Construction, Inc., lowest responsible bidder of four - Total not to exceed $379,700.00 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($354,700.00) and National Recreation and Park Association Grant Fund ($25,000.00)
vote.description: Authorize (1) reprogramming of funds in an amount not to exceed $33,782.60 from 2017 General Obligation Bond Funds originally allocated as Council District 8 Discretionary Funds for the Singing Hills Recreation Center Replacement to playground replacements at Danieldale Park in the amount of $5,000.00 and Willoughby Park in the amount of $28,782.60; and (2) a construction contract for the construction of playground replacements at Danieldale Park located at 300 West Wheatland Road, in the amount of $200,100.00 and Willoughby Park located at 9000 Willoughby Boulevard, in the amount of $179,600.00 - Henneberger Construction, Inc., lowest responsible bidder of four - Total not to exceed $379,700.00 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($354,700.00) and National Recreation and Park Association Grant Fund ($25,000.00)
